title: Jozef
data:
{{obsolete}} {{monster |name=Jozef |glyph={{LightMagenta|@}} |tile=[[File:Jozef.png]] |flags={{Unique flag}}
{{Fighter flag}}

{{Speaks flag}} |resistances=None |vulnerabilities=None |max_chunks=3 |meat={{Contaminated corpse}} |xp=1900 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=-5 |hp_range=90 |avg_hp=90 |armour_class=0 |evasion=9 |habitat=land |speed=10 |size={{Medium}} |item_use={{Weapons armour}} |attack1=18 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=11 |base_hp=0 |extra_hp=0 |fixed_hp=90 |intelligence={{Normal intelligence}} |genus=human |species=human }} {{Flavour|A tall bounty hunter.}} ==Useful Info== '''Jozef''' was a fairly ordinary [[human (monster)|human]] [[unique]], often generating with a moderately powerful melee weapon and an assortment of annoying spells, and occasionally with [[throwing net]]s or a [[sling]]. He could be found in [[the Lair]] or the [[Elven Halls]]. Spells: [[Teleport Other]], Healing, [[Venom Bolt]], [[Slow]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *While not particularly lethal in his own right Jozef can be incredibly annoying. He has a habit of slowing and poisoning you, then teleporting you into some exciting new death trap. Try to engage him on a cleared level where others won't interfere. ==History== Jozef was removed in [[0.11]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]] [[Category:Human]]
